# External Module

External-facing pages and service assets for third-party access.

## Pages
- **ServiceAssets** - External service asset management

## Structure
```
external/
├── index.ts      # Module entry point
├── manifest.ts   # Module metadata
├── registry.ts   # Component registration
├── pages/        # Page components
├── i18n/         # Translations
└── help/         # Tour guides
```
